newsitem.title: USA: AT&T, Pacific Animated set deal.
newsitem.headline: AT&T, Pacific Animated set deal.

text.p: - Pacific Animated Imaging Corp (PAI) on Monday announced an alliance with AT&T Corp which it said would significantly boost revenues.
PAI said its Forsight division joined AT&T's alliance of web site developers, giving access to AT&T customers who are looking for a web presence. No financial details were given.

"The rapid growth of AT&T's hosting services will increase PAI's public exposure and significantly enhance the sales momentum for Web site creation that we have been building over the last year," said PAI chairman John Cadigan. -- Nick Louth, New York Newsroom 212 859 1712
